name: augment-context-engine
description: Bring full codebase context into your AI workflows. The Augment Context Engine MCP delivers deep semantic understanding across large, long-lived codebases, including architecture, dependencies, and history. Use it to move beyond file-level prompts, plan changes with confidence, and automate complex tasks safely. Make system-level context a native input to your agents so AI can operate reliably on real-world production software.
